title: Cannot contact support and transfering wont finish(please read)
body: So I transfered from EUW to  EUNE(like a hour ago). It says "Your account is in the process of transferring. Please try again in a few minutes. If this issue persists, contact player support." **I can't.** Yes I'm logged in on the boards somehow, but when I go to the page where I want to submit the ticket, I'm logged out and it wont let me log in. No matter what server I try eune or euw. What am I supposed to do?

replies.body: A transfer might take a moment to process, and not necessarily instantaneous.  If it does seem to take a bit, though, reach out to our support team.  I know you can't submit a ticket, but we can be reached via support@riotgames.com as well.  We'll see you there!
